title: CEOs Recognize Venezuela's Potential: Teneo's Kajiwara
description: Kevin Kajiwara, Teneo President for Political Risk Advisory, says CEOs see Venezuela’s economic potential but are realistic about the challenges ahead. He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close. (Source: Bloomberg)
